endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all registered devices within the organization.
Register a new device to the organization's asset database.
Fetch detailed information for a specific device using its unique identifier.
Update the information linked to a specific device.
Remove a device from the organization's asset database.
Obtain a comprehensive inventory report of all IT assets.
Initiate an inventory check and obtain discrepancies, if any, with the current records.
Retrieve predictive lifecycle statuses for all assets based on usage patterns.
Retrieve and analyze the lifecycle status for a specific device.
Generate a report suggesting optimization recommendations based on current IT asset usage.
